Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell systems are advantageous in distributed power generation and are commonly utilized in residential buildings.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a hybrid desiccant cooling system

Sentencas: However, since commercialized small-scale solid oxide fuel cells generally produce hot water using high-temperature exhaust gas, it is difficult to utilize thermal energy in high-temperature areas and during the summer.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a hybrid desiccant cooling system

Sentencas: The exhaust heat from the solid oxide fuel cell system can be effectively utilized by inte-gration with the hybrid desiccant cooling system.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a hybrid desiccant cooling system

Sentencas: In this study, a numerical model of a solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a hybrid desiccant cooling system has been developed to determine the optimal system configuration and operating strategy.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a hybrid desiccant cooling system

Sentencas: As for the Hot-dry, Hot-humid, and Mixed-humid, which are representative climatic conditions of summer in the United States, were selected.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a hybrid desiccant cooling system

Sentencas: The system model has been simulated at a period of the highest electrical demand in a year with each climate.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a hybrid desiccant cooling system

Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell-hybrid desiccant cooling system model has been simulated to compare the system efficiency at 4 case.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a hybrid desiccant cooling system

Sentencas: The simulation results show that the solid oxide fuel cell-hybrid desiccant cooling system without a burner has the highest total efficiency of 77.7 % and the highest total coefficient of performance of 1.528 under electric load following operation.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a hybrid desiccant cooling system

Sentencas: This study can provide the basic insight to establish the parametric analysis and control strategy in integrating the solid oxide fuel cell system and the desiccant cooling system.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a hybrid desiccant cooling system
